Title: 1. People
Write-Up Text: â€¢ These people are causing a stir on social media with their no-filter approach! Public opinion is divided over the surging tax receipts in Australia and the need to create a sovereign wealth fund. While some are supportive, others are angry over the perceived lack of transparency, with one individual venting about an allocated $4.5 billion that "delivers nothing". Additionally, there is a battle taking place over the country's use of fossil fuels, with certain politicians being accused of hypocrisy. Finally, we have a call to question to economists and officials who can't seem to deliver on the promises of political campaigns. Ranting, raving, and fiery opinions abound in the entertaining world of social media!
